entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early this evening then light before morning. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
